message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper is about named entity recognition using a deep bidirectional language model, BERT, which is a popular technique in natural language processing. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to fine-tune the pre-trained BERT model, which falls under the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also evaluates its model using the CONLL 2003 score, which is a common evaluation metric in natural language processing and falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper focuses on named entity recognition for the Persian language, which falls under the sub-category of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE).
